summary: Team reviewed Q1 roadmap. API gateway v2 on track for March with 40% p99 improvement. SSO auth migration blocked on provider; deadline set for Friday before switching to plan B.

action_items.description: Escalate SSO provider, get response by Friday or switch to plan B
Finalize gateway v2 performance benchmarks for March release

key_decisions: Friday deadline for SSO provider response
Plan B fallback if no response
